item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 21, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Getting Forked by Microsoft (1076 points | 568 comments)
2. Why LLM-Powered Programming Is More Mech Suit Than Artificial Human (101 points | 53 comments)
3. Show HN: Dia, an open-weights TTS model for generating realistic dialogue (7 points | 1 comment)
4. Launch HN: Magic Patterns (YC W23) – AI Design and Prototyping for Product Teams (47 points | 21 comments)
5. Adding keyword parameters to Tcl procs (7 points | discuss)
6. Spark AI (YC W24) is hiring a full-stack engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
7. Out of the Fog (85 points | 14 comments)
8. Tabular Programming: A New Paradigm for Expressive Computing (18 points | 5 comments)
9. Python's new t-strings (436 points | 281 comments)
10. The Tontine Coffee-House (2018) (33 points | 14 comments)

12. Haskelling My Python (98 points | 40 comments)
13. Decentralizing Schemes (4 points | discuss)
14. Reverse engineering the obfuscated TikTok VM (325 points | 90 comments)
15. Handwriting activates broader brain networks than typing (47 points | 24 comments)

21. Experimenting is above all a process (18 points | discuss)
22. Pope Francis has died (696 points | 471 comments)
23. Gemma 3 QAT Models: Bringing AI to Consumer GPUs (565 points | 254 comments)
24. The effect of deactivating Facebook and Instagram on users' emotional state (405 points | 384 comments)
25. The campaign to subvert Africa's internet registry (7 points | discuss)
26. Show HN: I built an AI that turns GitHub codebases into easy tutorials (788 points | 155 comments)
27. Crows can recognize geometric regularity (159 points | 70 comments)
28. Find the Odd Disk (174 points | 110 comments)
29. TikZJax: Embedding LaTeX Drawings in HTML (122 points | 28 comments)
30. How encryption for Cinema Movies works (183 points | 97 comments)
